古扇: (ふるおうぎ) - old fan; worn out fan
古手: (ふるて) - disused article; ex-soldier; retired official
古拙: (こせつ) - artless but attractive in a quaint sense
古文学: (こぶんがく) - paleography; the study of ancient writings

古文書学: (こもんじょがく) - paleography; study of ancient documents; study of ancient writing
古時計: (ふるどけい) - antique clock; old clock

古本: (こほん) - secondhand book; (こほん only) ancient book/antiquarian books
古来: (こらい) - from time immemorial; ancient; time-honoured; time-honored
古株: (ふるかぶ) - old-timer/veteran/senior; (original meaning) old stump/old roots
古格: (こかく) - convention; usage; old customs; old etiquette
古歌: (ふるうた) - old song; old poem

古武道: (こぶどう) - ancient Japanese martial arts

古注: (こちゅう) - commentaries of the ancients
古流: (こりゅう) - old manners; old style; old school (of art)

古狐: (ふるぎつね) - old fox; old-timer; schemer

古神道: (こしんとう) - ancient Shinto (as practiced prior to the Introduction of Confucianism and Buddhism to Japan)

古窯趾: (こようし) - ruins of old kilns; old kiln sites

古筝: (こそう) - Guzheng (type of ancient Chinese zither)

古色蒼然: (こしょくそうぜん) - (yoji) antique-looking; looking hoary with patina
